tool_description: API for world climate change around the world
name: World Climate Change Live
title: World Climate Change Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source npr
api_list.description: Return endpoint individual news from npr.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-change-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/npr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-change-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-change-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-change-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all climate change-related news from around the world.
api_list.code:

url = "https://world-climate-change-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-change-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
